price: 5. Tokkel Ni digaala keenih temeete waqdi, usun abeenih yanin dooqa malón, aben dambi Aalamuk nanu diggah daalimiinih yan marah sugne iyyaanam akke waytek.
arabic: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَىٰهُمۡ إِذۡ جَآءَهُم بَأۡسُنَآ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: famā kāna daʿwāhum idh jāahum basunā illā an qālū innā kunnā ẓālimīna
